    analysis: {
      filter: {
        galician_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_galician_",
        },

          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["exemplo"],
        },
        galician_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",

        },
      },
      analyzer: {

          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: [
            "lowercase",
